body: Photos & Multimedia         Wagons and camera of Sam A. Cooley, U.S. photographer, Department of the South Library of Congress  Chickamauga and Chattanooga National Military Park maintains both photo and multimedia galleries. Photos include both modern images of the park, photos from special events, as well as historic images from Chattanooga. Videos include both short form documentary films as well as videos highlighting special events in the park. All photos and videos in our photos & multimedia galleries are in the public domain, and may be freely used. Please use appropriate citations as listed with each image or video.
title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Photos & Multimedia
